Dear Bridges Community,

During these difficult times, Bridges stands in unity with our Black students, families, and colleagues in support of those speaking out against racism and systematic oppression. Though our hearts are heavy over these recent events, we are hopeful and encouraged by the acts of peaceful protest that have taken place in our city, across the US and around the world. We believe that Black Lives Matter. We are committed to building a supportive and inclusive community that allows the voices of our Black students to be heard. To all of those in our Bridges family and beyond who are speaking out against racial injustice: we hear you, we support you, and we thank you.
